The [[Android (operating system)|Android]] operating system for smartphones was released in 2008. Android is an [[open source|open-source]] platform backed by [[Google]], along with major hardware and software developers (such as [[Intel]], [[HTC Corporation|HTC]], [[ARM Holdings|ARM]], [[Motorola]] and [[Samsung]], to name a few), that form the [[Open Handset Alliance]].<ref>{{cite web
